InitializeDD4hep.DD4hepXMLFile: Name of the DD4hep compact xml file to load
InitializeDD4hep.EncodingStringParameterName: If given, the Compact File parameter of that name will be used as argument to LCTrackerCellID::set_encoding_string()

IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.CutOnTheISOElectronMVA: Cut on the mva output of isolated electron selection
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.CutOnTheISOMuonMVA: Cut on the mva output of isolated muon selection
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.DirOfISOElectronWeights: Directory of Weights for the Isolated Electron MVA Classification
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.DirOfISOMuonWeights: Directory of Weights for the Isolated Muon MVA Classification
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.InputPrimaryVertexCollection: Name of the Primary Vertex collection
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.IsSelectingOneIsoLep: flag to select one most like isolated lepton
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.MaxEOverPForElectron: Maximum ratio of energy in calorimeters over momentum for electron
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.MaxEOverPForMuon: Maximum ratio of energy in calorimeters over momentum for muon
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.MinEOverPForElectron: minimum ratio of energy in calorimeters over momentum for electron
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.MinEecalOverTotEForElectron: minimum ratio of energy in ecal over energy in ecal+hcal
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.MinEyokeForMuon: Minimum energy in yoke for electron
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.OutputIsoLeptonsCollection: Name of collection with the selected isolated lepton
IsolatedLeptonTaggingProcessor.OutputPFOsWithoutIsoLepCollection: Name of the new PFOs collection without isolated lepton
